pr_title: WFLY-13887 Add http-connections element to jboss-ejb-client_1_4.xsd s…

timeline.bodyText: http-connection should be documented as a sub-element in its subsection under http-connections, just like remoting-ejb-receiver is a subelement of ejb-receivers.
timeline.author: chengfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -50,6 +53,12 @@ client context, should use pass-by-reference (instead of pass-by-value) semantic
 * `outbound-connection-ref` Reference to an outbound connection configured in the remoting subsystem.
 * `connect-timeout` The timeout, in milliseconds, to be used while creating a connection.
 
+[[http-connections]]
+=== <http-connections>
+
+* `http-connection` HTTP Connection for EJB invocation.

timeline.bodyText: the indentation is a bit off. Need to reformat the addition.
timeline.author: chengfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -162,6 +162,37 @@
         </xsd:attribute>
     </xsd:complexType>
 
+    <xsd:complexType name="http-connectionsType">
+        <xsd:choice>
+        <xsd:element name="http-connections" type="http-connectionsType" >
+            <xsd:annotation>
+                <xsd:documentation>
+                    Configures remote http-connections for EJB invocation
+                </xsd:documentation>
+            </xsd:annotation>
+        </xsd:element>
+        </xsd:choice>
+    </xsd:complexType>
+
+    <xsd:complexType name="http-connectionType">
+    <xsd:choice>
+        <xsd:element name="http-connection" type="http-connectionType" >
+            <xsd:annotation>
+                <xsd:documentation>
+                    Configures remote HTTP Connection for EJB invocation
+                </xsd:documentation>
+            </xsd:annotation>
+        </xsd:element>
+    </xsd:choice>
+        <xsd:attribute name="uri" type="xsd:string" use="required">
+            <xsd:annotation>
+                <xsd:documentation>
+                    Uniform Resource Identifier for the HTTP connection
+                </xsd:documentation>
+            </xsd:annotation>
+        </xsd:attribute>
+    </xsd:complexType>
+

timeline.author: chengfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -162,6 +162,37 @@
         </xsd:attribute>
     </xsd:complexType>
 
+    <xsd:complexType name="http-connectionsType">
+        <xsd:choice>
+        <xsd:element name="http-connections" type="http-connectionsType" >
+            <xsd:annotation>
+                <xsd:documentation>
+                    Configures remote http-connections for EJB invocation

timeline.bodyText:
Need min and max bound for choice:
<xsd:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
timeline.author: chengfang

timeline.bodyText: Need to remove the above choice element.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -162,6 +162,37 @@
         </xsd:attribute>
     </xsd:complexType>
 
+    <xsd:complexType name="http-connectionsType">
+        <xsd:choice>
+        <xsd:element name="http-connections" type="http-connectionsType" >
+            <xsd:annotation>
+                <xsd:documentation>
+                    Configures remote http-connections for EJB invocation
+                </xsd:documentation>
+            </xsd:annotation>
+        </xsd:element>
+        </xsd:choice>
+    </xsd:complexType>
+
+    <xsd:complexType name="http-connectionType">
+    <xsd:choice>
+        <xsd:element name="http-connection" type="http-connectionType" >
+            <xsd:annotation>
+                <xsd:documentation>
+                    Configures remote HTTP Connection for EJB invocation
+                </xsd:documentation>
+            </xsd:annotation>
+        </xsd:element>
+    </xsd:choice>
